title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 23 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 23 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Sidney Powell controversy. Trump legal team called big press conference, didn't deliver the blockbusters. Trump should do rallies in Georgia to save those two vital senate seats. MSNBC smear Friday's caller who teared up over the lack of support from elected Republicans in election dispute. Jimmy Carter-James Baker delivered blue ribbon report on election fraud in 2005, predicted everything that happened, might have been a roadmap to cheating for Democrats. Hollywood pouring money into Georgia. Georgia installed 30,000 Dominion machines in Georgia for $100 million. Carter-Baker report on election fraud. Dershowitz: Trump legal team has several paths, but need the evidence. Trump voters are scared. Theories on Sidney Powell. Biden puts Kerry in charge of climate. PA appeals court grants expedited review of Trump case.                                           


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

 

Jenna Ellis insults Frank Luntz. Douglas Brinkley: Trump will form shadow gov't with Rush Limbaugh in Palm Beach. Victor Davis Hanson: All we have left is talk radio. Never Trumpers should ask themselves why they hate Trump. Christopher Bedford Federalist piece on election fraud. The Never Trumpers are jealous of Trump, they were running a scam all these years taking money from you and never getting anything done. Trump implemented all the conservatism the Never Trumpers never did. Trump has destroyed ISIS and Al-Qaeda, taken on Iran. More theories on Sidney Powell. Sharpton warns COVID vaccine could be racial hoax.                         


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Bedford column on how important election fraud really is. BizPac Review: China-controlled newspaper paying American news organizations for advertising campaigns. Pope Francis hosts NBA players to talk social justice. College football players wear "End Racism" on jerseys instead of names. More theories on Sidney Powell. Biden to push gun tax. Horowitz column on the election saboteurs, Republicans refusing to realize we're in a war with the Democrats. Chris Christie calls Trump legal team an embarrassment. Mediate runs headline saying Rush trashed Trump legal team. Rush isn't pulling a Christie. This is too important, we must go back to holding elections on Election Day and knowing the results that night.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
